item.title: Widowmaker Ability Overview | Overwatch

meta.summary:
b'One shot, one kill: http://bit.ly/MeetWidowmaker

Widowmaker is the perfect assassin: a patient, ruthlessly efficient killer who shows neither emotion nor remorse. She possesses extensive training in the covert arts, and with her scientifically altered physiologywhich has drastically slowed her heart and turned her skin blueshe feels little more than the satisfaction of a job well done. 

Widowmaker is equipped with essential tools for eliminating her targets: poison gas mines; a powerful sniper rifle that has an alternate, fully automatic firing mode; a grappling hook for quickly reaching the perfect perch; and her signature visor, which grants infra-sight thats shared with her allies, revealing the location of nearby enemies. 

Sign Up for Beta: http://bit.ly/JoinOverwatch 
Like Us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/playoverwatch 
Follow Us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/playoverwatch'

item.title: How GRANDMASTER Players DESTROY With Widowmaker | TAIMOU - Overwatch Season 7 Competitive Guide

meta.summary:
b'----------------------------------------------------------------
This video was sponsored by Guilded. Find out more about the best Overwatch LFG around, plus a chance at a $50 Blizzard Card giveaway here: https://www.guilded.gg/JoeKingYT
----------------------------------------------------------------


Today we are back again trying a top 500 tip Widowmaker video because I think its fun and people just love Widowmaker it seems. Today we are talking about how the grandmaster Widowmaker player can carry his competitive games in season 7 overwatch competitive ranked mode. Going over some Widowmaker season 7 tips and guide or whatever you want to call it. thanks! 




More Videos! : https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLefC4eOMnbRF5Xm7uCjfU73bh0ybup9Df



Gameplay: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7177L-GNkDk
Thumbnail:https://pbs.twimg.com/media/C_Q2U6MUMAAa2hV.jpg
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------



======================================================================

TIPS I WROTE DOWN FROM THE VIDEO:
-While your team is starting to push up, wait for people to peak around corners for a pick
-always go in after your team has already engaged
-Dont ignore tanks
-Use your hookshot to send you flying to escape people following you
-If you are facing a shield, its ok to run trhough it and finish off tanks with your machinegun mode
-After you get a teamwipe, push up a ton for free picks
-If you are getting healed and someone is attacking you, just scope and try to get the 1 shot
-If you dont think you can get the headshot on a close range tank, just machine gun him
-Charge up your sniper before you walk around walls/doors
-Dont use your hookshot until the Widowmaker has jumped
-You dont need tanks on your team to play widow, just use height and distance to stay safe


-put a mine at enemy spawn for free ult charge, then shoot another one out for more charge/vision
-try to position to where you will be the furthest away from when enemies dive
-Your ult makes you beat widow in 1v1 always
-Dont be afraid to just double bodyshot supports, especially a non ulting mercy
-dont peak around walls if enemies have a widow, use your hookshot to get in position
-bodyshotting a tracer forces her to waste her e, keeping you pretty safe
-switch to another hero if the map gets way to close in and there is no good long range angles

======================================================================





What is overwatch?: Well overwatch is Blizzards new take on the fps genre. In this game you choose a hero or "Class" to take on enemies, push payloads, and take control points. The point of the game is to beat the other team over and it is indeed a whole bunch of fun to play. The game includes 27 heroes so far and Is a blast to play. In this video I mostly go over playing it in a commentary type of manner, and these types of videos will usually be overwatch live commentaries or overwatch group commentaries. As well expect a few guides of this game in the future and some box openings as well. Anyways, hope you enjoy blizzards new hit!'

Who is JoeKing aka me. Im a overwatch youtuber that likes to talk about character updates, how to get better, and the competitive community. Trying to help you get better at overwatch and entertain at the same time hopefully. How GRANDMASTER Players DESTORY with Widowmaker - Overwatch Top 500 PRO Tricks Overwatch - 20 TricksWidowmaker Grandmasters ABUSE That You Don't! Some tips and tricks to master Widowmaker! Overwatch - 7 OP Tips and Tricks Grandmaster Players use every game! item.title: How to improve your Widowmaker/ DPS play Dramatically: Overwatch Coaching GrandMaster Vod review

meta.summary:
b"This video is a testament to the typical answer from dps players who wish their aim was better, this vod features a player who has top notch aim but lacks in other areas including cool down management and positioning. You need more than just aim to reach the top.
Points of interest: 2.00- first fight advantages 
3.00- identifying threats and reacting
6.00- re engagement critical thinking 
11.00- identifying a lost or won fight and playing for better positioning on the next one
12:30- my biggest tip to DPS players who think that they deserve to be higher, part of this being they have good aim
20.00 Lines of sight, lanes and map control 
25.00- staying alive, identifying when your the enemy greatest threat
27.30- more sight line management 
31.00- setting up crossfires 
34.00- how being spawn camped or being hard focused can be turned into a positive 
37.00 echinwalde 3rd point sight lines
41.00- even if you're beginning to loose duels, how to stay effective
44.50- 3 takeaways
50.30- Bonus content: deeper explanation of cross angles and setting up crossfires"

item.title: Overwatch Widowmaker Guide - Best Sensitivity For YOU

meta.summary:
b"Trouble figuring out where to set your sensitivity in Overwatch? Weagal breaks down the pros and cons to different philosophies on where to set your sensitivity. Ultimately, it will be based on preference, the lower you play, the more mouse mat you'd need and will require your whole arm to aim, the higher you play on will test your ability to control and may cause you to miss what you're aiming at if you can't handle it. Note this video was created before the Widowmaker nerf dropped.

item.title: [LEARN OVERWATCH] Widowmaker Practice Drills Improve Your Aim Guide

meta.summary:
b"Some Widowmaker practice drills I used to or still do.
They helped me a lot back when my aim was non-existent, hope they'll help you as well!
______________________________________

Parts:
0:25 - Training mode practice (Basic drills)
1:36 - Widow forbidden jutsu!
3:29 - Custom game practice (Advanced drills).
5:29 - Giving my love to you!
______________________________________

Settings for the custom game

MODES:
-SKIRMISH
 * HEALTH PACK RESPAWN TIME SCALAR: 10%
 * RESPAWN TIME SCALAR: 0%

MAPS
-SKIRMISH
 *NUMBANI (ALL OTHER MAPS ARE TURNED OFF IN ALL OF THE MODES)

HEROES
-GENERAL
 *ABILITY COOLDOWN TIME: 0%
 *NO AMMUNITION REQUIREMENT: ON
 *RECEIVE HEADSHOTS ONLY: ON
-ANA
 *BIOTIC GRENADE: OFF
 *DMG DEALT: 10%
 *HEALING DEALT: 10%
 *HEALING RECEIVED: 10%
 *HEALTH: 500%
 *SLEEP DART: OFF
 *ULTIMATE ABILITY: OFF
-SOLDIER 76
 *DMG DEALT: 10%
 *HEALING DEALT: 10%
 *HEALING RECEIVED: 10%
 *HEALTH: 500%
 *ULTIMATE ABILITY: OFF
-WIDOWMAKER
 *DAMAGE DEALT: 500%
 *DAMAGE RECEIVED: 10%
 *HEALING RECEIVED: 500%
 *HEALTH: 500%
 *RECEIVE HEADSHOTS ONLY: ON
If you liked the video, check out my channel and subscribe to see all the latest uploads. 

Social Media
Twitch: twitch.tv/slay4joy
Twitter: twitter.com/slay4joy"
